name: Logitech G PRO X Superlight 2
description: The esports standard at just 60g. Features HERO 2 sensor with 44K DPI, LIGHTSPEED wireless, and 95-hour battery life. No holes needed for extreme lightness.

reviews.review_text: Used by more pros than any other mouse. Enough said.
60g feels like nothing. Aim has improved noticeably.
